column2: name
Set Out
Work area clear and ready to start
Check latest plans and revisions
Check all wall types and linings have been allowed for
Check walls for square and parallel
Check openings for correct size and location
Area left clean and tidy
Steel Stud
Work area ready and approval to progress
Latest consented drawings available, checked and referenced
Set out is correct and signed off
Dimensions/locations of walls checked and correct
DPC to underneath to bottom plates and where framing meets concrete
All frames are square and plumb
Deflection head track installed correctly, no gaps to double layer gib strips on firewalls
Nogging track is installed and in correct location as per SRP manual
Steels stud are correct size installed at correct centres
Studs to be "free" at deflection head, staple, punch in the top track
Intersections of walls/corners/T juntions/etc framed as per SRP technical manual
Door and window openings are in correct location and correct size
Door framing constructed correctly for door type
Tracklok bracing installed as per KCL design and specification
Area left clean and tidy
Insulation
Area checked for correct insulation used for all wall/ceiling types
Has insulation installed correctly with no gaps to insulation
Has insulation been installed correct around services (ie pipes and plugs)
Area left clean and tidy
Plasterboard Linings
Correct linings used as per gib site guide/drawings
Correct screws used as per gib site guide
Screws fixed at recommended centres and/or glued as per gib guidelines
Screws installed to correct depth
Sheets are fitted tightly
All butt joints occur over framing
Screws minimum 12mm from sheet edge
Plasterboard to corners, intersections and wall ends correctly
Area has been cleaned properly
All rubbish has been disposed
